alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 10 at 2:34AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...For the south Washington Coast and Willapa Hills. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rain, heavy at times will continue until daybreak Sunday. Then, rain will be decreasing. In general, total rainfall of 2 to 4 inches is expected. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible flood warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
